= Advertising In GWT =
 I wanted other people to know that they have other options if you can't advertise with Google's AdSense. 

 == Try These Companies For a Spin ==
 Try these companies for a spin.

  === AdBrite ===
  [http://www.adbrite.com/mb/landing_both.php?spid=96893&afb=468x60-2 AdBrite] -This is a fantastic way to advertise. It was easier to setup than Google's AdSense. After being denied use of AdSense, I starting using AdBrite. You can also use the referral program in your Google Project for monetization, which is a fantastic option since Google has none.

  === AdSense ===
 [https://www.google.com/adsense/login/en_US/ AdSense] - This probably won't work if lots of your site requires login, as what happened to me.

  === Linkshare ===
 [http://www.linkshare.com/ Linkshare] - Another possiblity in advertising content.
